FirstPart.Title: Studymate boosts your productivity
FirstPart.Description: Discover all the study rooms and start studying! Make new friends and study together online!

SecondPart.Title: Everything you need to study
SecondPart.Description: Studymate is not just another web application for studying together. It has much more than just study rooms.

Messages.Title: Messages
Messages.Description: Studymate is not just another web application for studying together. It has much more than just study room

StudyRooms.Title: Private Studyrooms
StudyRooms.Description: Besides public ones, we also have private study rooms. This so you can study at your leisure with your friends

People.Title: Get to know new people
People.Description: Meet new people and study with them. Who knows, your new bestie might be in your group

ToDo.Title: To Do's
ToDo.Description: Add projects and tasks and tick them off while studying!

Tasks.Title: Task overview
Tasks.Description: Here you can see all your tasks

LatestStudyRooms.Description: Here you can see the newest studyrooms

DeleteUser.Description: Once your account is deleted, you will lose all your information. Please enter your password to delete your account.

Modal.Description: Once your account is deleted, you will lose all your information.

UpdatePassword.Title: Security settings
UpdatePassword.Description: Make sure your account is secure by using a strong & long password.
